data.title: Albert B. Chandler Hospital
data.meta_description: Opened in 1962, the University of Kentucky Albert B. Chandler Hospital, a 569-bed acute care hospital, is part of the UK HealthCare patient care …
data.text:
The hospital parking garage is located at 110 Transcript Ave., directly across S. Limestone from UK Chandler Hospital. Parking is free for UK HealthCare patients and visitors.

Directions − If you need directions to or from the hospital, stop by an information desk for assistance or ask one of the service ambassadors in the garage.

Proceed to Level A of the garage for wheelchair-friendly shuttle transportation to the entrance of UK Chandler Hospital.

Emergency Department

Parking for our Emergency Department (ED) is located across South Limestone in our hospital garage. We provide a free shuttle service to and from the garage 24 hours a day, every five minutes. Please inform the driver you are going to the ED so you can be dropped at the appropriate stop. A small parking lot at our ED entrance has a 30-minute time limit. This can be used to drop off passengers prior to moving the car to the garage. Please speak with a security officer when you are ready to return to the garage for your car.
